parameter.name: X_ADB_StartTime
parameter.description: After the test is requested, this parameter contains the absolute start time of the IP ping.

parameter.name: X_ADB_TestCode
parameter.description: A test code string that will be copied in the uploaded report files.

parameter.name: X_ADB_StartTime
parameter.description: After the test is requested, this parameter contains the absolute start time of the IP ping.

parameter.name: X_ADB_TestCode
parameter.description: A test code string that will be copied in the uploaded report files.

parameter.name: X_ADB_StartTime
parameter.description: After the test is requested, this parameter contains the absolute start time of the UDP echo test

parameter.name: X_ADB_TestCode
parameter.description: A test code string that will be copied in the uploaded report files.

parameter.name: X_ADB_TestCode
parameter.description: A test code string that will be copied in the uploaded report files.

parameter.name: X_ADB_TrafficPriority
parameter.description: Set the upstream priority queue where the traffic must be routed.

parameter.name: X_ADB_TestRate
parameter.description: The test data transfer rate, in {{units}}, as from: : 8 * {{param|TestBytesReceived}} / ({{param|EOMTime}} - {{param|BOMTime}}) / 1000

parameter.name: X_ADB_TotalRate
parameter.description: The total data transfer rate, in {{units}}, as from: : 8 * {{param|TotalBytesReceived}} / ({{param|EOMTime}} - {{param|BOMTime}}) / 1000

parameter.name: X_ADB_TestCode
parameter.description: A test code string that will be copied in the uploaded report files.

parameter.name: X_ADB_TrafficPriority
parameter.description: Set the upstream priority queue where the traffic must be routed.

parameter.name: X_ADB_TestRate
parameter.description: The test data transfer rate, in {{units}}, as from: : 8 * {{param|TestBytesSent}} / ({{param|EOMTime}} - {{param|BOMTime}}) / 1000

parameter.name: X_ADB_TotalRate
parameter.description: The total data transfer rate, in {{units}}, as from: : 8 * {{param|TotalBytesSent}} / ({{param|EOMTime}} - {{param|BOMTime}}) / 1000
